Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as exaggerating the ease and speed of filling out tax returns in Estonia by stating that it can be done in five minutes.
Understate: The claim may be seen as understating the actual efficiency of the Estonian tax system, as the experts mentioned that it can be done in even less time than claimed.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient supporting evidence or data to back up the assertion that tax returns can be filled out in five minutes.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the ease and speed of filling out tax returns in Estonia can be directly compared to the process in other countries without considering potential differences in tax systems or complexities.
Exist alternative explanation: There might be alternative explanations or factors that contribute to the efficiency of the Estonian tax system, which are not mentioned in the claim.
